setting.value:
We could really use some [B][COLOR white]help covering our ever-increasing offshore server expenses[/COLOR][/B]! Since you seem to regularly enjoy our Kodi addons and tools, we thought it could be a good idea to respectfully seek out your generosity.
Please Visit the Following Link to Donate Today: [B][COLOR white]https://www.tvaddons.ag/donate/[/COLOR][/B]
If you want to help support our community but [B][COLOR white]can't afford to donate, please take the time to visit our sponsors regularly[/COLOR][/B], this will help us cover expenses without taking a dime from your pockets.
Remember that we're a community of volunteers, we don't charge anything for our software and don't get any kickbacks from box sellers either. Thank you again for your continuous support!
